fullText:
Vicious Spirit

Paragon Tier
Prerequisite: 11th level, shaman, healing spirit power, Stalker Spirit class feature
Benefit: When you use healing spirit, each ally adjacent to your spirit companion gains a +2 bonus to damage rolls against bloodied enemies until the end of your next turn.

Published in Primal Power, page(s) 145.
name: Vicious Spirit
